description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Fish & Rice Bowl With Bean Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Spicy Fish & Rice Bowl With Bean Salsa
name: Spicy Fish & Rice Bowl With Bean Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g skinned and boned ling fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle remaining spice mix over fish. Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook fish for 3-4 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions. Place rice in serving bowl. Top with lettuce leaves, salsa, roughly flaked fish, avocado dressing. Garnish with reserved coriander leaves to serve.
